course_description: The goal of the course is to familiarize students with the digital media landscape as it relates to marketing strategy. As digital marketing tactics become more common among organizations, digital strategy will become integrated into the broader marketing strategy.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the One-Year or Two-Year MBA program.
